about_the_game:
Enter a surreal wonderland where destinies intertwine and shadows loom over the fabric of reality. In this ethereal realm, a young boy, Alister, ventures forth alongside enigmatic companions—a witch named Line, a besmirched prince named Aloe, and the enigmatic demon-turned-human, Halo.

Embark on an odyssey through a kaleidoscope of wonders, encountering peculiar characters and witnessing events that ripple through this bizarre world. Alister, with animal-like features, stands amidst a tapestry of choices, facing the allure of power and the gravity of sacrifice.

Journey through branching narratives that unfold divergent paths, each decision shaping the fate of the surreal wonderland and its inhabitants. Uncover the unsettling truth veiled within the realm's mysteries, navigating alliances and treacheries, striving to restore balance, or succumbing to the looming darkness.

As destinies intertwine, friendships are tested, alliances are shattered, and a chilling power seeks dominion over this enigmatic realm. Discover the cost of defiance, the weight of sacrifice, and the echoes of a soul trapped in an eternal slumber, its fate bound to the surreal wonderland's inexorable destiny.

Welcome to Wonderland; choices matter here, so to speak. Here, thing's of any sort can happen....
-----------------------------------------

This is an adventure story driven RPG game with over-the-top designs and stories.

Features:

  • Puzzles
    Multiple endings
    A branching story
    Play different characters as the game branches on
    Original music and outsourced too!

highlighted.name: ALL FOR ONE ONE FOR ALL

name: Alister In Wonderland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel CORE i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to wonderland, a place of dreams. Take on the role of Alister Hinch and go on a journey through this surreal realm of enchantment and wonder. Experience making friends in this realm... Now, what ending will you choose to have?
